game.name: Orrin's Chessboard
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 지형을 바꿔 운명을 바꿔라.이 로그라이트 타워 디펜스 게임에서는 매 턴마다 보드가 확장된다. 카드를 사용해 경로를 재구성하고 성을 지켜라.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Alter the terrain to change your fate. In this roguelite tower defense game, the board expands every turn. Use cards to reshape paths and defend your castle.

reviewHighlights.text: Early days, but at this stage a very good mazing Tower Defense title - arguably, one of the best. Don't let the "Chess" part of the name put you off -...
